pr_title: Included that AL privileges are part of ALL PRIVILEGES

timeline.bodyText: Could we point to https://crate.io/docs/crate/reference/en/latest/admin/privileges.html#privilege-types instead of listening the names here? This would avoid to miss a newly added privilege in future.
timeline.author: seut
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -251,7 +251,7 @@ wolfgang::
     GRANT OK, 4 rows affected (... sec)
 
 Using "ALL PRIVILEGES" is a shortcut to grant all the currently grantable
-privileges to a user, namely ``DQL``, ``DML`` and ``DDL``.
+privileges to a user, namely ``DQL``, ``DML``, ``DDL`` and ``AL``.

timeline.message: fixup! Included that AL privileges are part of ALL PRIVILEGES
Included that AL privileges are part of ALL PRIVILEGES
Included that AL privileges are part of ALL PRIVILEGES
